channel.title: How come nobody
channel.description:
blames God for any problems?
I never see that. But I see shitloads of people blaming each other, blaming entire countries, blaming organizations. Quite frankly, we can easily put ALL the blame on God (considering he is real).
I don't believe in him or any other religion. But this is a hypothetical argument. If he is real, and if he does what the bible says he does, we can blame him for everything gone wrong.
Oh, but you say people ruined the environment etc etc. Well. God put us here with it, and made it human nature to want shit, so it's his fault.
Get it?

item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“army_life, post:53, topic:236449”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=312032.msg2491134#msg2491134 date=1224118127]

Thats why you have to belive in ALLLAH!

[/quote]Dude seriously… I’m Muslim and if your just yelling out things that doesn’t even flow - shut up. At least spell Allah’s name right.

Go stap a bomb around your chest…

btw: ALLAH!!!

Show some respect to people’s religions, you don’t have to agree with them but you shouldn’t take the piss out of them just for being different to you.

Oh really, Damn your a hypocrite.[/quote]

Yes, I am - unfortunately your post gets reported and I have to respond. So how about you shut the fuck up before we slap you across the face with a ban. Yes, I’m a hypocrite and a dictator… get over it.

item.title: How come nobody
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:33, topic:236449”]Did I say that the Big Bang theory was a fact?

Evolution, on the other hand, is a fact. How would you explain that 90% of the DNA of a human is the same as that of a chimp? etc…[/quote]

Yeah it’s actually like more than 98%.

But then again our DNA is 70% similar to a dandelion iirc. Been awhile since I took this stuff in school

Read full topic

item.title: How come nobody
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:39, topic:236449”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=312032.msg2489018#msg2489018 date=1224004554]
Did I say that the Big Bang theory was a fact?

Evolution, on the other hand, is a fact. How would you explain that 90% of the DNA of a human is the same as that of a chimp? etc…
[/quote]
1+1 = 2
Who made that? That’s a fact? Why not 3? Just because you say a fact is proven by scientific data doesn’t do shit. I don’t give a fuck about science here unless you bring up a damn valid point. Keep that evolutionary shit in school. Evolution is not a fact, it’s a theory first of all - get it right, 'kay? A fact is only a fact to the person believing it.

It’s all about how you define things in the end. Just like good and evil [ethics in science]. Why do we have good and bad? It’s to set a standard so people don’t lose control and die everywhere… but is that really bad? We only say things by what we have experienced or learned. So correct me if I’m wrong

Damn it STH, why’d you even say anything. It’s bad enough we’ve had 30 topics about religion already.

Bumping year old threads? Also, these are the threads that are actually the matters to talk about. It’s very exciting :D[/quote]

Are you a retard? Use your fingers, if you stick one up, and then another you have two, not three.

Read full topic

item.title: How come nobody
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Well some things we didn’t really “make” we just gave names to.

But still. Believing in God doesn’t make him a fact to you.

It’s like. We’re at a bar. We’re sitting on stools. OMG we’re on top of a stool that’s real. It’s made from wood. We can see them made from wood and touch them and see that they’re wood. That’s a fact.

On the other hand, it’s not like we can sit here and see God and shit. Nothing like that. It’s not a fact just cause you believe in it.

I can believe all day that that stool isn’t wood and isn’t real. But that doesn’t change the fact that it is.

Read full topic

item.title: How come nobody
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:33, topic:236449”]Did I say that the Big Bang theory was a fact?

Evolution, on the other hand, is a fact. How would you explain that 90% of the DNA of a human is the same as that of a chimp? etc…[/quote]
1+1 = 2
Who made that? That’s a fact? Why not 3? Just because you say a fact is proven by scientific data doesn’t do shit. I don’t give a fuck about science here unless you bring up a damn valid point. Keep that evolutionary shit in school. Evolution is not a fact, it’s a theory first of all - get it right, 'kay? A fact is only a fact to the person believing it.

It’s all about how you define things in the end. Just like good and evil [ethics in science]. Why do we have good and bad? It’s to set a standard so people don’t lose control and die everywhere… but is that really bad? We only say things by what we have experienced or learned. So correct me if I’m wrong

ThAt0n36Uy:

Damn it STH, why’d you even say anything. It’s bad enough we’ve had 30 topics about religion already.

Bumping year old threads? Also, these are the threads that are actually the matters to talk about. It’s very exciting

That don’t means none of them are true.
